hints.content:
![](${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/82023b4a59d3a6521a6f84ad1a3e045d.png)

$\qquad \begin{align}&\green5 \text{ Ivy's layers}\\
+&  \underline{\blue5 \text{ Jo's layers }}\\
=&\pink{10} \text{ total layers}\end{align}$

question.content:
Ivy and Jo got dressed to go outside and play in the snow. They each put on $5$ layers of clothing.

**Write a number sentence to show how many layers of clothing Ivy and Jo were wearing all together. **

$5$ $ + $ [[☃ input-number 3]] $ = $ [[☃ input-number 4]]
